body:
Comment 1 by **emmanuel.feller**: 
As I didn't saw that template.Execute() was returning os.Error. I didn't saw the error
msg.

The template stops on template.go:line 722 : ie var name unfound (normal nil has no
field) and parent is nil 
(normal, nil is nil ;) ).
So i stops emitting a "name not found: %s" error.

imho, the repeated section should not iterate on nil value.
